languages.text: "Ваша Светлость! Для нас честь присутствовать во дворце фон Валанциус. Я — Лорна Эрэбис". {n}Бледная девушка чуть ниже Кибеллы нервно поправляет темную прядь и встает между ткачом и младшими братом с сестрой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость! Для нас большая честь присутствовать сегодня во дворце фон Валанциус. Я Лорна Эрэбис, наследница дома Эрэбис". {n}Бледная девушка ростом чуть ниже Кибеллы нервно поправляет темную прядь и встает между культисткой и младшими братом с сестрой.{/n}

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость! Для нас честь присутствовать во дворце фон Валанциус. Я — Лорна Эрэбис". {n}Бледная девушка чуть ниже Кибеллы нервно поправляет темную прядь и встает между ткачом и младшими братом с сестрой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It is an honour for us to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, straightens a lock of her dark hair nervously and stands between her younger siblings and the weaver.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It is an honour for us to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, straightens a lock of her dark hair nervously and stands between her younger siblings and the weaver.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smoothes a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the weaver.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smoothes a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the weaver.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne saurais vous exprimer à quel point nous sommes honorés d'être au palais von Valancius. Je suis Lorna Erebis. » {n}Comme prise au piège entre sa fratrie et la tisseuse, une jeune femme particulièrement pâle, légèrement plus petite que Kibellah, lisse d'un geste nerveux une mèche de ses cheveux noirs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne saurais vous exprimer à quel point nous sommes honorés d'être au palais von Valancius. Je suis Lorna Erebis. » {n}Comme prise au piège entre sa fratrie et la tisseuse, une jeune femme particulièrement pâle, légèrement plus petite que Kibellah, lisse d'un geste nerveux une mèche de ses cheveux noirs.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Es un honor visitar el palacio von Valancius. Soy Lorna Erebis». {n}Una mujer joven y pálida, un poco más baja que Kibellah, se alisa un mechón de pelo nerviosa mientras se interpone entre sus hermanos y la tejedora.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Es un honor visitar el palacio von Valancius. Soy Lorna Erebis». {n}Una mujer joven y pálida, un poco más baja que Kibellah, se alisa un mechón de pelo nerviosa mientras se interpone entre sus hermanos y la tejedora.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下！フォン・ヴァランシウスの宮殿にお招きいただき光栄です。私はローナ・エレビスと申します」{n}キベラより少し背の低く、肌の青白い若い女性が、弟と紡ぎ手の間に立ち、緊張した面持ちで自分の黒髪をなでる。 {/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！フォン・ヴァランシウスの宮殿にお招きいただき光栄です。私はローナ・エレビスと申します」{n}キベラより少し背の低く、肌の青白い若い女性が、弟と紡ぎ手の間に立ち、緊張した面持ちで自分の黒髪をなでる。 {/n}

languages.text: “您来了，大人！我们很荣幸来到冯·瓦兰修斯家族的宫殿，我是洛娜·伊雷比斯。”{n}一位脸色苍白、身高比绮贝菈略矮的女子站在她的弟弟妹妹与绮贝菈之间，紧张地抚摸着她的黑发。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “您来了，大人！我们很荣幸来到冯·瓦兰修斯家族的宫殿，我是洛娜·伊雷比斯。”{n}一位脸色苍白、身高比绮贝菈略矮的女子站在她的弟弟妹妹与绮贝菈之间，紧张地抚摸着她的黑发。{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wir fühlen uns geehrt, den Palast derer zu Valancius betreten zu dürfen. Ich bin Lorna Erebis." {n}Eine blasse junge Frau, etwas kleiner als Kibellah, dreht nervös an einer Locke ihres dunklen Haars, während sie zwischen ihren jüngeren Geschwistern und der Spinnerin steht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wir fühlen uns geehrt, den Palast derer zu Valancius betreten zu dürfen. Ich bin Lorna Erebis." {n}Eine blasse junge Frau, etwas kleiner als Kibellah, dreht nervös an einer Locke ihres dunklen Haars, während sie zwischen ihren jüngeren Geschwistern und der Spinnerin steht.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Von Valancius sarayında bulunmaktan onur duyuyoruz. Ben Lorna Erebis." {n}Kibellah'dan biraz daha kısa boylu, solgun genç kadın; kardeşleriyle dokur arasında dikilirken siyah saçının bir buklesini gergince düzeltiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We are honoured to be at the von Valancius palace. I am Lorna Erebis." {n}A pale young woman, slightly shorter than Kibellah, smooths a lock of her dark hair nervously as she stands between her younger siblings and the spinner.{/n}
